original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph WHERE p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=25
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 25
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.PostId=E2.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2.PostId=E3.PostId)
